member.name: T:Majestic12.HTMLparserTest
member.summary: HTMLparserTest: example of use of the HTML parser object

member.name: F:Majestic12.HTMLparserTest.bReadLineDelay
member.summary: If true then an ENTER will be required when running this test in interactive mode (default) This mode can be switched off via command line switch NODELAY

member.name: M:Majestic12.HTMLparserTest.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: If you don't know what this function is, then its probably best for you not to proceed.

member.name: M:Majestic12.HTMLparserTest.Start(System.Int32,System.String)
member.param: Number of times to parse document (useful for benchmarking)

member.name: M:Majestic12.HTMLparserTest.BenchMarkParse(Majestic12.HTMLparser)
member.summary: Parse for benchmarking purposes -- its pure test of HTML parsing object, no extra processing done here

member.name: M:Majestic12.HTMLparserTest.ParseAndPrint(Majestic12.HTMLparser)
member.summary: Parses HTML by chunk, prints parsed data on screen and waits for ENTER to go to next chunk

member.name: M:Majestic12.HTMLparserTest.HandleMetaEncoding(Majestic12.HTMLparser,Majestic12.HTMLchunk,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Handles META tags that set page encoding
